entry.title: 백준 - 미로 탐색(#2178)
entry.content:
백준 2178번

from collections import deque

N,M = map(int,input().split())
maps = [list(map(int,list(input()))) for _ in range(N)]
visited = [[False]*M for _ in range(N)]

dx = [1,-1,0,0]
dy = [0,0,1,-1]

def bfs(i,j):
  visited[i][j]=True
  queue = deque([[i,j]])
  while queue:
    x,y = queue.popleft()
    
    for i in range(4):
      nx,ny=x+dx[i],y+dy[i]

      if nx<0 or ny<0 or nx>N-1 or ny>M-1:
        continue

      if maps[nx][ny]==1:
        if not visited[nx][ny]:
          visited[nx][ny]=True
          map[nx][ny]=maps[x][y]+1
          queue.append([nx,ny])

  return maps[N-1][M-1]

print(bfs(0,0))

  • 백준 - 섬의 개수(#4963)
  • 백준 - 치즈(#2638)
  • 백준 - 점프 점프(#11060)

entry.title: 백준 - 가장 긴 수열(#11053)
entry.content:
N=int(input())
array = list(map(int,input().split()))

dp = [1]*N
for i in range(N):
    for j in range(i):
        if array[i]>array[j]:
            dp[i]=max(dp[i],dp[j]+1)

print(max(dp))

entry.title: 프로그래머스 - 전화번호 목록
entry.content:
from collections import deque

def solution(phone_book):

    if len(phone_book)==1:
        return True

    phone_book.sort()
    queue = deque(phone_book)
    prefix = queue.popleft()
    while queue:
        if queue[0].startswith(prefix):
            return False
        prefix = queue.popleft()
    return True

  • 백준 - 섬의 개수(#4963)

entry.title: 프로그래머스 - 단어변환
entry.content:
answer=[]

def dfs(begin,target,start,graph,visited,count):
    global answer
    if begin==target:
        answer.append(count)
        return
    
    visited[start]=True
    for i in range(len(graph)):
        if not visited[i]:
            if sum(graph[i][j]!=begin[j] for j in range(len(begin)))==1:
                dfs(graph[i],target,i,graph,visited,count+1)
                
def solution(begin, target, words):
    if not target in words:
        return 0
    
    for i in range(len(words)):
        if sum(words[i][j]!=begin[j] for j in range(len(begin)))==1:
            visited=[False]*len(words)
            dfs(words[i],target,i,words,visited,1)
            
    if not answer:
        return 0
    else:
        return min(answer)

  • 백준 - 섬의 개수(#4963)
  • 백준 - 치즈(#2638)

entry.title: 프로그래머스 - 더 맵게
entry.content:
from heapq import heapify, heappop, heappush
def solution(scoville, K):
    answer = 0
    heapify(scoville)
    
    while len(scoville)>=1:
        if scoville[0]>=K:
            return answer

        if len(scoville)==1:
            return -1

        first = heappop(scoville)
        second = heappop(scoville)
        heappush(scoville,first+2*second)
        answer+=1

    return -1

  • 백준 - 섬의 개수(#4963)
  • 백준 - 치즈(#2638)
  • 백준 - 점프 점프(#11060)

entry.title: 프로그래머스 - 멀리 뛰기
entry.content:
def solution(n):
    dp=[0]*(n+2)
    dp[1]=1
    dp[2]=2
    for i in range(3,n+1):
        dp[i] = dp[i-1]+dp[i-2]
        
    return dp[n]%1234567

  • 백준 - 섬의 개수(#4963)

entry.title: 프로그래머스 - 기능 개발
entry.content:
import math
from collections import deque

def solution(progresses, speeds):
    days = []
    answer=[]
    
    for i in range(len(progresses)):
        days.append(math.ceil((100-progresses[i])/speeds[i]))

    queue = deque([])
    count=0
    
    for i in range(len(days)):
        if not queue:
            queue.append(days[i])
            
        elif queue[0]<days[i]:
            queue.popleft()
            queue.append(days[i])
            answer.append(count)
            count=0
            
        count+=1
    answer.append(count)
    return answer

  • 백준 - 섬의 개수(#4963)
  • 백준 - 치즈(#2638)
  • 백준 - 점프 점프(#11060)
  • 백준 - 나무 자르기(#2805)

  • 백준 - 가장 긴 수열(#11053)

entry.title: 백준 - 단지번호붙이기(#2667)
entry.content:
백준 2667번

#BFS를 이용한 풀이
from collections import deque
import sys
input = sys.stdin.readline

N = int(input())
maps = [list(map(int,input().strip())) for _ in range(N)]
visited=[[0]*N for _ in range(N)]
answer=[]

dx = [1,-1,0,0]
dy = [0,0,1,-1]

def bfs(i,j):
    queue = deque([[i,j]])
    count=1
    while queue:
        x,y = queue.popleft()
        for i in range(4):
            nx,ny=x+dx[i],y+dy[i]

            if nx<0 or ny<0 or nx>N-1 or ny>N-1:
                continue
            
            if not visited[nx][ny]:
                if maps[nx][ny]==1:
                    visited[nx][ny]=1
                    count+=1
                    queue.append([nx,ny])
    return count

for i in range(N):
    for j in range(N):
        if not visited[i][j]:
            if maps[i][j]==1:
                visited[i][j]=1
                answer.append(bfs(i,j))

answer.sort()
print(len(answer))
for i in answer:
    print(i)

#DFS를 이용한 풀이
import sys
input = sys.stdin.readline

N = int(input())
maps = [list(map(int,input().strip())) for _ in range(N)]
visited = [[False]*N for _ in range(N)]
answer=[]
dx=[1,-1,0,0]
dy=[0,0,1,-1]

def dfs(x,y):
    global count
    for i in range(4):
        nx,ny=x+dx[i],y+dy[i]
        if nx<0 or ny<0 or nx>N-1 or ny>N-1:
            continue
        if not visited[nx][ny]:
            if maps[nx][ny]==1:
                count+=1
                visited[nx][ny]=True
                dfs(nx,ny)

for i in range(N):
    for j in range(N):
        if not visited[i][j]:
            if maps[i][j]==1:
                visited[i][j]=True
                count=1
                dfs(i,j)
                answer.append(count)
answer.sort()
print(len(answer))
for i in answer:
    print(i)

  • 백준 - 섬의 개수(#4963)
  • 백준 - 치즈(#2638)
  • 백준 - 점프 점프(#11060)
  • 백준 - 나무 자르기(#2805)
  • 백준 - 회의실 배정(#1931)
  • 백준 - 단지번호붙이기(#2667)
  • 백준 - 미로 탐색(#2178)
  • 백준 - 가장 긴 수열(#11053)

entry.title: 백준 - 나무 자르기(#2805)
entry.content:
백준 2805번

import sys
input = sys.stdin.readline

N,M = map(int,input().split())
namu = list(map(int,input().split()))
cutting = 0

def binarySearch(array,start,end,target):
    if start>end: 
        return
    global cutting

    mid = (end+start)//2
    cut = 0
    for i in array:
        if i>mid:
            cut+=i-mid

    if cut<target:
        binarySearch(array,start,mid-1,target)
        
    else:
        cutting = mid
        binarySearch(array,mid+1,end,target)

binarySearch(namu,0,max(namu),M)
print(cutting)

  • 백준 - 섬의 개수(#4963)
  • 백준 - 치즈(#2638)
  • 백준 - 점프 점프(#11060)
  • 백준 - 나무 자르기(#2805)

entry.title: 백준 - 회의실 배정(#1931)
entry.content:
백준 1931번

import sys
input = sys.stdin.readline
n = int(input())

meetings=[list(map(int,input().split())) for _ in range(n)]
meetings = sorted(meetings, key=lambda x:(x[1], x[0]))

end_time = 0
count=0
for meeting in meetings:
	if meeting[0] >= end_time:
		count += 1
		end_time = meeting[1]

print(count)

  • 백준 - 섬의 개수(#4963)
  • 백준 - 치즈(#2638)
  • 백준 - 점프 점프(#11060)
